actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to require the utilization of small business as a condition of receiving certain amounts of Federal financial assistance for the procurement of articles, equipment, supplies, services, materials, or construction work.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to require the utilization of small business as a condition of receiving specified amounts of Federal financial assistance for the procurement of articles, equipment, supplies, services, materials, or construction work.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to require the utilization of small business as a condition of receiving certain amounts of Federal financial assistance for the procurement of articles, equipment, supplies, services, materials, or construction work.
